headline: Full Stack Developer and Creative Director at Hamonicare NG
bioMarkdown:
Hi, I'm Cyprianüëã, founder of [EscapeBills](https://github.com/onloopdev/escapebills). I'm currently pursuing my Bachelor degree in Computer Science in National Open University Nigeria. I volunteer with every Saturday to teach School Girls Robotics and Arduino as an intern at ! [STEMNOVO NG](https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&opi=89978449&url=https://ng.linkedin.com/company/stemnovo-ng&ved=2ahUKEwiusqmMmbiSAxU8UkEAHWrBH78QFnoECBwQAQ&usg=AOvVaw1m9wDxRo_WqvKMYWWjoq-P) for 5 years, mentored by Mr [John Onuigbo](https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&opi=89978449&url=https://ig.wikipedia.org/wiki/%25E1%25BB%258Cbanife:John_Onuigbo&ved=2ahUKEwiusqmMmbiSAxU8UkEAHWrBH78QFnoECDMQAQ&usg=AOvVaw1lK2kGtoTMSfJSNKPcfhDO) . You can find more about my background in my [CV](./resume.pdf).

üî¨ **Research Interests:** Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence.
